user_query: I'm planning a trip to Japan and want to explore investment opportunities in the Japanese stock market. Can you provide me with the statistics information of stocks in Japan? Additionally, I would like to know the current market capitalization and real-time rates of popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.

TaskList.description: Gather statistics information of stocks in Japan, including historical performance and current prices.
Retrieve the current market capitalization of the Japanese stock market.
Fetch real-time rates for popular cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin and Ethereum.
